mapper.select:
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getMenuList */ menu_seq , parnt_seq , pstn , lft_val , rht_val , dpth , menu_type , menu_nm , adm_url , user_url , use_yn , (select count(*) from co_menu_mst where parnt_seq = a.menu_seq) as childcnt
, (select menu_seq from co_adm_menu_dtl where adm_seq = #{admSeq} and menu_seq = a.menu_seq) as checktype
, gnb_yn from co_menu_mst a where 1=1 and lft_val > (select lft_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) and rht_val < (select rht_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) /* 사용자 메뉴 관리는 가져오지 말아야 한다. */
/* 관리자 수정에선 로그관리 메뉴는 미노출*/
and (!(lft_val > 6 and rht_val < 15))
order by lft_val

select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getUserMenuList */ menu_seq , parnt_seq , pstn , lft_val , rht_val , dpth , menu_type , menu_nm , adm_url , user_url , use_yn from co_menu_mst a where menu_type = 'menu' order by lft_val

select /* COBUserMenuMapper.selectMenuDtl */ menu_seq , parnt_seq , pstn , lft_val , rht_val , dpth , menu_type , menu_nm , sub_menu_nm , adm_url , user_url , gnb_yn , wnpp_yn , seo_kwrd , seo_cntn , use_yn , ( select menu_nm from co_menu_mst b where a.parnt_seq = b.menu_seq ) parntName from co_menu_mst a where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getRhtVal */ rht_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{parntSeq}
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getdpth */ dpth + 1 as dpth from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{parntSeq}
mapper.update: update /* COBUserMenuMapper.setLftVal */ co_menu_mst set lft_val = lft_val + 2 where lft_val > #{rhtVal}
update /* COBUserMenuMapper.setRhtVal */ co_menu_mst set rht_val = rht_val + 2 where rht_val >= #{rhtVal}
mapper.select: select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getMaxPosition */ count(*) from co_menu_mst where parnt_seq = #{refSeq}
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getMoveNodeIds */ menu_seq from co_menu_mst where 1=1 and lft_val >= #{lftVal} and rht_val <= #{rhtVal}
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getRefInd */ lft_val from co_menu_mst where 1=1 and parnt_seq = #{refSeq} and pstn - #{self} = #{pstn} order by pstn limit 1
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getMoveExits */ menu_seq from co_menu_mst where 1=1 and lft_val >= #{lftVal} and rht_val <= #{rhtVal} and menu_seq in (#{refSeq})
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getMoveExits2 */ count(*) from co_menu_mst where 1=1 and parnt_seq = #{refSeq} and pstn - #{self} = #{pstn}
mapper.update: update /* COBUserMenuMapper.setDeleteUpdateLftVal */ co_menu_mst set lft_val = lft_val - (#{rhtVal} - #{lftVal} + 1) where lft_val > #{rhtVal}
update /* COBUserMenuMapper.setDeleteUpdateRhtVal */ co_menu_mst set rht_val = rht_val - (#{rhtVal} - #{lftVal} + 1) where rht_val > #{lftVal}
mapper.select: select /* COBUserMenuMapper.getParntData */ menu_seq , parnt_seq , menu_nm from co_menu_mst a where lft_val <= (select lft_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) and rht_val >= (select rht_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) and dpth >= (select dpth - 1 from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) order by lft_val
select /*COBUserMenuMapper.getChildNodeData*/ menu_seq ,parnt_seq ,pstn ,menu_nm from co_menu_mst where parnt_seq = #{menuSeq} and user_use_yn = 'Y' order by pstn
select /* COBUserMenuMapper.selectUserTopNode */ menu_seq from co_menu_mst where menu_type = 'menu' order by lft_val
mapper.update: update /* COBUserMenuMapper.updateMenuUseYn */ co_menu_mst set USE_YN = 'N' where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}
mapper.select: select /* COBMenuMapper.getClientMenuList */ menu_seq , parnt_seq , pstn , lft_val , rht_val , dpth , menu_type , menu_nm , user_url , seo_kwrd , seo_cntn , gnb_yn , (select count(*) from co_menu_mst where parnt_seq = a.menu_seq) as childcnt from co_menu_mst a where a.use_yn = 'Y' and lft_val > (select lft_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) and rht_val < (select rht_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = #{menuSeq}) order by lft_val
